resources.string: A space on the Abalone grid

The aim of the game is to push 6 of your opponents counters off the board while defending your own. You can move up to 3 counters at a time provided they are all along a single line and there are no obstructions to any of the intended counters. You can push your opponents counters if you have more counters in that line, just as a strong man can push a weak man, 3 counters in a line can push 2 and 2 counters can push 1. Equal numbers cannot push each other.
 Player 1 (Red) goes first and each player takes one turn each until the game has reached its end.


There are three different game modes:


Single Player 


-Play on your own against a computer player


Local Multiplayer 


-Play against a friend on one phone


Networked Multiplayer 


-Play against a friend in your Google Plus circle across the internet (internet connection required)
